 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּלַשׁ‎</span>] **verb Hithpa\`el** ==act of mourning==, possibly ==roll in== (dust, etc.; weakened from ***burrow into***) (Late Hebrew Pi\`el ***break open, or through***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***palâšu***</u></abbr>, ***dig a hole***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***dig*** or ***break through***; but connection dubious, [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] mostly ***be-sprinkle oneself***, [[BDB#Aq|Aq]] ***roll oneself***); — ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָפָר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְפַּלָּ֑שְׁתִּי‎</span> [[Mic.1.10|Mic 1:10]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּלָּ֑שִׁי‎</span>-), others masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּלָּ֑שׁוּ‎</span>-); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּאֵפֶר יִתְפַּלָּ֑שׁוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.27.30|Ezek 27:30]], so ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתֵפַּלֵּשִׁי בָאֵפֶר‎</span> [[Jer.6.26|Jer 6:26]] (compare [[Mic.1.10|Mic 1:10]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]); absolute, masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתֵפַּלְּשׁוּ‎</span> [[Mic.25.34|Mic 25:34]].
